net.engio.daoism.dao.jpa

Class UnitOfWork

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.engio.daoism.dao.jpa.UnitOfWork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUnitOfWork

    public abstract class UnitOfWork
extends Object
implements IUnitOfWork
    An implementation of IUnitOfWork interface for JPA 2.0. It offers access to an instance of entity manager using the instance variable em.
    Author:
    Benjamin Diedrichsen
